name: OMABM FOUNDATION

address: C-92, TOP FLOOR, NEAR - SPAN HOUSE,

briefDescription: OMABM FOUNDATION’s soul motive is to see healthy “Leprosy free India” and give due justice to this special class of people along with their children. Education for all is the forte of OMABM which encircles children of leprosy patients in particular plus education for other subjugated class in general. Our educational programme is currently benefiting around 1000 children spread across the nook and corner of the country.    We undertake, organize, conduct and facilitate awareness conference and lecture in schools, colleges, corporate and in social gathering to remove stigma.Provision of employment to women and subjugated class of the society by small & medium scale industries including cottage and handicraft.

address: C-92, TOP FLOOR, NEAR - SPAN HOUSE,
